name: No Longer Me
description:
NOTE: The one downloadable from itch.io is a scaled down version.
Please Download my Files from Dropbox if you would like the non scaled version or just the source code in general

Non-Scaled Version:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/oei1bcxpzw36njj/TheActualGame.zip?dl=0
Source code:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/b2gzbky15it6pzy/SourceCode.zip?dl=0

Controls:

Left Mouse Click to Attack 
Right Mouse Click (or 1/2) to Change Characters

Shift to use Special
- Swordsman/Hero: Dash
- Shooter: Ray

Space to Jump
E to Possess a defeated enemy

CREDITS:
Created by KAITO SUGIMURA
Special Thanks AOI UEKI https://aoi-ueki.itch.io/
Engine Used UNREAL ENGINE 5

Used Unreal Assets 
Paragon: Minions - Epic Games
Soul: City - Epic Games
